channel.title: Poetries on Meet Chandershekhar
channel.description: Recent content in Poetries on Meet Chandershekhar

item.title: Social Isolation
item.description: People wait for their chance To go out and have a dance Yet he still prowls in wait Waiting of your date Nothing is more morbid Than COVID of the horrid He journeys to the lungs And there remains clung May all proceed with caution Or fight him as an option
